channel.title: If I wanted to make a training area
channel.description:
All I know how to do CORRECTLY is spawn the NPC's.
What else am I missing? NPC Drops I am missing for sure, but what else?

item.title: If I wanted to make a training area
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Changing all the commands and object teleports which take you to the training area to the new co-ords, a bank maybe and bordering so people don’t go wandering off into what could be your staff zone.

Read full topic
item.source: If I wanted to make a training area
